title: BombDown
description: Donna is asked to speak to a scientist about a plan to shoot down an asteroid. Still in grad school, her new job doesn't offer much in the way of good looking guys, but what about Geoffrey? He's new. But there's little time to study this. North Korean and South Korean subs now are firing nuclear warheads at the asteroid. The North Koreans will be darned if the South shoots it down before them.
author: John Blandly
